title: Damaged and the Bulldog
description: Dylan Campbell took a bullet to save the girl of his dreams. This fateful day changed everything. Now Dylan struggles to claim Winnie as his own while making his bones with the Reapers MC.Winona Todds was broken by life. Hiding from the world, she remains consumed with fear until her heart craves Dylan. SheÂ´ll need to face her past to build a future with the man with the bulldog tattoo.
author: Bijou Hunter
